issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1.Phone > Camera > camera custom overlay
2.take an image and use it, check console output

Wed Apr 27 09:21:16 unknown com.apple.SpringBoard[24] <Notice>: CoreAnimation: timed out fence 1111
Wed Apr 27 09:21:18 unknown com.apple.SpringBoard[24] <Notice>: CoreAnimation: timed out fence 1111
Wed Apr 27 09:21:18 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.pushtest[0x9942][3757] <Notice>: wait_fences: failed to receive reply: 10004003

exists in 1.6.2, looks like 3.1.3 only (not seen on 4.1 device)
fields.summary: iOS: status bar turns white as the camera overlay animates in

comments.body: Due to the age of this ticket, I am closing it. If still a problem, please reopen.
